title: The Bully
description: Dean Yenin (son of Adrian Yenin)Mafia families from around the world send their children to Kingmakers Academy to learn the skills of criminal enterprise.Under the rules of Sanctuary, students are forbidden to fight or kill. But rivalries are high, tensions inflamed, and forbidden love arises in the most unlikely placesâ€¦Welcome to Kingmakers
author: Sophie Lark
